name: 2017_10_humanities_student_major_268_premed
title: 2017-10-humanities-student-major_268_premed.txt
content_scrubbed:
* Year in school: 4th year in a liberal_arts college
* Country/state of residence: NY
* Schools to which you are applying: Not sure yet
* Cumulative GPA: 3. 76
* Science GPA: 3. 78
* MCAT Scores: 519 (132/131/130/126)
* Research: Will have 3 years in a chem lab by the time I apply, 5 posters (including 2 at national conferences), 2 ongoing publications with 2nd/3rd author respectively, 1 potential 1st author publication (not counting on this)
* Volunteering (clinical): Around 480-500 hours of working as an EMT (1. 5 years), 10-15 hours at a volunteer clinic (4 months)
* Physician shadowing: 30 hours with neuro-ophthalmologist (6 weeks), 10 hours in a colorectal surgery dept and internal medicine (combined, 2 days), looking for more within the next few months
* Non-clinical volunteering: 160 hours SAT tutoring for high school students in low-income neighborhoods (10 months), 60 hours in a hospice house (don't think this counts as clinical, 8 months)
* Extracurricular activities: Member of various clubs, designed a chemistry outreach program at a local high school, TA for chem lab
* Employment history: EMT, TA, homework grader, sales associate in retail
* Immediate family members in medicine? N
* Specialty of interest: Unsure
* Interest in rural health (y/n): N

I am applying next June and hope to increase my shadowing hours by then. Any advice is welcome!
